heading: HR00936
0: A RESOLUTION INSTITUTING A DOMESTIC REGULATORY SYSTEM WHEREBY THE YOUTH ARE METHODICALLY DENIED ANY AND ALL ACCESS TO PORNOGRAPHY IN ALL ITS FORMS IN ORDER TO INSULATE THEM FROM PORNOGRAPHY'S DISASTROUS EFFECTS
status: Pending with the Committee on YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT since 2017-05-03
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00936
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION INSTITUTING A DOMESTIC REGULATORY SYSTEM WHEREBY THE YOUTH ARE METHODICALLY DENIED ANY AND ALL ACCESS TO PORNOGRAPHY IN ALL ITS FORMS IN ORDER TO INSULATE THEM FROM PORNOGRAPHY'S DISASTROUS EFFECTS
